title: Patralekha Paul
text:
Patralekha Paul (born 20 February 1989) is an Indian actress. She made her debut with director <a href="Hansal%20Mehta">Hansal Mehta</a>'s Hindi film "<a href="CityLights%20%282014%20film%29">CityLights</a>", alongside <a href="Rajkummar%20Rao">Rajkummar Rao</a>.
Early life.
Patralekha was born in <a href="Shillong">Shillong</a>, Meghalaya, in a <a href="Bengalis">Bengali</a> family, to a Chartered Accountant father and a homemaker mother Papri Paul. In an interview, she stated that her grandmother was a poet. She has two siblings Parnalekha Paul and Agnish Paul. She went to <a href="The%20Assam%20Valley%20School">The Assam Valley School</a>, a boarding school, and then graduated from <a href="Bishop%20Cotton%20Girls%27%20School">Bishop Cotton Girls' School</a>, <a href="Bangalore">Bangalore</a>. Her father wanted her to follow in his footsteps, but she was interested in acting. While studying in <a href="H.R.%20College%20of%20Commerce%20and%20Economics">H.R. College of Commerce and Economics</a> she did a few commercials for Blackberry, and Tata Docomo, before getting a break in films.
Personal life.
Patralekha has been in a relationship with actor <a href="Rajkummar%20Rao">Rajkummar Rao</a> since 2010. On November 15, 2021 the couple got married in a traditional Hindu wedding at The Oberoi Sukhvilas Spa Resort in Chandigarh, India.
Career.
Patralekha made her film debut with a leading role in the drama "<a href="CityLights%20%282014%20film%29">CityLights</a>", opposite <a href="Rajkummar%20Rao">Rajkummar Rao</a>. Directed by <a href="Hansal%20Mehta">Hansal Mehta</a>, the film tells the story of a poor couple living in <a href="Rajasthan">Rajasthan</a> who move to <a href="Mumbai">Mumbai</a> in search of livelihood. Made on a low budget, the film became a commercial success and earned her positive reviews from critics. 
Her next film, "<a href="Love%20Games%20%28film%29">Love Games</a>", was an urban-thriller directed by <a href="Vikram%20Bhatt">Vikram Bhatt</a> and produced by <a href="Mukesh%20Bhatt">Mukesh Bhatt</a> and <a href="Mahesh%20Bhatt">Mahesh Bhatt</a>. The cast of the film included Patralekha, <a href="Gaurav%20Arora">Gaurav Arora</a> and <a href="Tara%20Alisha%20Berry">Tara Alisha Berry</a>.
